EmailTemplate.name: 2018 Dealer Update #16.2018 Dealer Update #16
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | November 2018
Ovation Select CS Cabin Management System Upgrade
- The Ovation C-Series MHT touchscreen display and control device has been obsolete for several years. As of December 31, 2018 the MHT will no longer be repaired. - These bulletins outline options that allow operators to upgrade to a new Ovation SelectTM Touchscreen system. - Here are Honeywell Sales Bulletins 2018-35 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018-35 Ovation Select CS CMS MHT-TO-OST Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>, 2018-36 and 2018-37 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018-37 Ovation Select CS CMS MHT-TO-OST Upgrade for Global Express.pdf]]>.
- Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0Y02600QXt0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
